content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences, but if you're looking to avoid crowds, weekdays outside of Japanese holidays and school breaks generally have fewer visitors. It's also worth noting that the park is typically less busy earlier in the day when it first opens, so arriving first thing in the morning can be a good strategy. Keep in mind that the park can get quite crowded during peak seasons and holidays, so it's important to plan ahead and purchase tickets well in advance to avoid long lines at the entrance. Ultimately, the best time to visit Tokyo DisneySea really depends on your schedule and preferences!
